===Appearance===
<!--Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 2 paragraphs with 3-4 sentences each.-->
Isidore is a tall man with fair skin, green eyes and blond hair. He has as scar running horizontally over his nose.

He wears a white, long-sleeved shirt with a yellow tie under a blue backless sleeveless vest with a black belt over his waist. He wears dark gray pants and white boots with black details. His accessories are black gloves and a black fedora.
